caption.title: The proportion of total infections caused by established clusters is more sensitive to a frequency criterion than the duration of time.
caption.p: Established antigenic clusters account for the majority of the disease activity. In our analysis, established clusters are those that circulate above 20% relative frequency for at least 45 days. We choose the most stringent criteria that, when only accounting for clusters that reached the criteria, still maintained the overall cyclical influenza dynamics.
Click here for additional data file.
